articles.title: Cocaine levels in Nantucket’s wastewater are growing exponentially. No one is sure exactly why.
articles.description:
After measuring 50% above national levels in September, the island saw even steeper increases later in the year.

The post Cocaine levels in Nantucket’s wastewater are growing exponentially. No one is sure exactly why. appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Nantucket's wastewater cocaine levels rose 50% above national averages in September 2023.
Later measurements indicated even steeper increases, raising concerns among local officials.
Rising drug levels may impact public health and safety for Nantucket residents.

articles.title: Readers across Massachusetts share photos from Monday’s blizzard
articles.description:
Photos show heavy snow, low visibility, and everyday scenes transformed by the storm.

The post Readers across Massachusetts share photos from Monday’s blizzard appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Residents across Massachusetts shared photos capturing Monday's blizzard's heavy snow and low visibility.
Boston experienced significant snowfall, with reports of up to 12 inches in some areas.
The storm disrupted daily life, affecting commutes and local services throughout the region.

articles.title: Massport: ‘there will be delays’ Tuesday at Logan Airport after the blizzard
articles.description:
Massport says travelers should check their flight status before going to the airport.

The post Massport: ‘there will be delays’ Tuesday at Logan Airport after the blizzard appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Massport warns of significant delays at Logan Airport due to Tuesday's blizzard.
Travelers are advised to check flight statuses before heading to the airport.
Local residents should anticipate travel disruptions affecting both arrivals and departures.

articles.title: First responders in Cohasset carry patient with snowblower injury to ambulance, which then got stuck
articles.description:
The responders then had to shovel out the ambulance amid Monday's blizzard.

The post First responders in Cohasset carry patient with snowblower injury to ambulance, which then got stuck appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: First responders carried a patient with a snowblower injury during Monday's blizzard.
The ambulance became stuck in snow, requiring shoveling to free it.
This incident highlights challenges for emergency services during severe winter weather in Boston.

articles.title: Review & setlist: Margo Price shows just enough country contrariness at Royale
articles.description:
"I've lived there long enough that I've earned the right to hate it," Price said of Nashville, even as her music emulated the best of the country music capital.

The post Review & setlist: Margo Price shows just enough country contrariness at Royale appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Margo Price performed at Royale in Boston on February 22, 2026.
Price expressed her mixed feelings about Nashville during the concert.
Local fans enjoyed a blend of traditional and contrarian country music.

articles.title: Robert Carradine, ‘Revenge of the Nerds’ and ‘Lizzie McGuire’ star, dies at 71
articles.description:
In the 2000s, Carradine gained small-screen success in The Disney Channel’s “Lizzie McGuire” as the eponymous character’s father.

The post Robert Carradine, ‘Revenge of the Nerds’ and ‘Lizzie McGuire’ star, dies at 71 appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Robert Carradine, known for 'Revenge of the Nerds', died at 71 on February 24, 2026.
Carradine played the father in Disney's 'Lizzie McGuire', impacting Boston's youth culture in the 2000s.
His death marks the loss of a beloved figure in entertainment for many Boston residents.

articles.title: Photo showing collapsed roof at Barking Crab amid blizzard was AI
articles.description:
The restaurant said on social media that the video shared Monday was "as AI as it gets."

The post Photo showing collapsed roof at Barking Crab amid blizzard was AI appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Barking Crab clarified that a viral photo of a collapsed roof was generated by AI.
The restaurant posted the clarification on social media on February 24, 2026.
Local residents can trust that Barking Crab's structure remains intact despite blizzard rumors.

articles.title: Savannah Guthrie says her family is offering a $1 million reward for her mother’s recovery
articles.description:
Savannah Guthrie said Tuesday that her family is still holding out for a miracle and hopes her mother will be found alive, but she also acknowledged that they realize it might be too late.

The post Savannah Guthrie says her family is offering a $1 million reward for her mother’s recovery appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Savannah Guthrie's family offers a $1 million reward for her mother's safe return.
Guthrie expressed hope for her mother's recovery despite concerns about time running out.
This situation highlights the emotional toll on families in crisis within the Boston community.
